Ingredients.7: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.11: 0.25 cup shredded lettuce, or as desired (Optional)

Ingredients.12: 0.25 cup sour cream, or as desired (Optional)

Directions.1: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.

Directions.2: Combine refried black beans, black beans, green chiles, garlic powder, chili powder, cayenne, salt, and pepper in a saucepan. Heat over medium heat until warm and combined, 3 to 4 minutes.

Directions.3: Place tostada shells on an ungreased baking sheet and evenly distribute bean mixture between them. Top with Monterey Jack cheese.

Directions.4: Broil in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, watching carefully to avoid burning tostadas, 1 to 3 minutes.

Directions.5: Serve immediately and garnish with salsa, lettuce, sour cream, and guacamole.
